wikipedia_page.main: Michael Clasper CBE (born 21 April 1953) is the British Chairman of Coats Group plc (formerly Guinness Peat Group plc (GPG)) and the former chairman of Her Majesty's Revenue and Customs (HMRC) (2008-2012).

response: The chairman of HMRC was an executive role until 2008. Mike Clasper served as a non-executive chairman. From August 2012, the post was abolished with a 'lead non-executive director' chairing board meetings instead.

When Paul Gray resigned as chairman following the loss of the Child Benefit database, Hartnett took over the post in an acting capacity. After permanent replacements were appointed, Mike Clasper as non-executive chairman and Lesley Strathie as Chief Executive, Hartnett was appointed to a new post of Second Permanent Secretary for Tax, with responsibility for tax professionalism.
